game.name: Cheese Simulator (most realistic Version)
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Cheese Simulator (most realistic Version) is a bullet hell-style Singleplayer PC Game, where you take control of a small piece of cheese with one goal in mind: becoming the best tasting cheese in the world.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cheese Simulator (most realistic Version) is a bullet hell-style Singleplayer PC Game, where you take control of a small piece of cheese with one goal in mind: becoming the best tasting cheese in the world.
